I am quite new to this game compared to others , however , I have much to say!
It was much fun to play competitive , and the community is so nice!
Skins are extremely intresting , however it should be duly noted scammers are definitely not uncommon.
It could run on my potato ass pc before I managed to get a new one.

All in all 12/10 game , GabeN.
